title: Fairy Lady
description:
Don Manuel and Cosmo are visiting town to stay with Don Manuel's friend Don John de Toledo for the young Prince's christening, when suddenly a a veiled lady begs for their aid and protection. "My honour and my life are forfeit if I am overtaken or discovered by the person that comes yonder in pursuit of me." And so the intrigue of this farce begins.... - Summary by ToddHW

Cast list:
Don Manuel Enriquez: Adrian Stephens
Don John de Toledo: Greg Giordano
Don Lewis de Toledo, his brother: ToddHW
Cosmo, Don Manuel's servant: Jake Malizia
Rodrigo, Don Lewis's servant: Alan Mapstone
Donna Angela, sister of Don John and Don Lewis: Sonia
Donna Beatrice: Availle
Isabella, Donna Angela's maid: WendyKatzHiller
One of the Ladies: Sanarik Moirangthem
Stage Directions: James R. Hedrick
Editing: ToddHW
